Title: Team Explorer Extensions
Description: Team Explorer Extensions are a collection of extensions to the Team Explorer pane in Visual Studio 2012 and Visual Studio 2013 (e.g. Auto Associate Merge)
HomeWiki:
Team Explorer Extensions
Team Explorer Extensions are a collection of extensions to the Team Explorer pane in Visual Studio 2012 and Visual Studio 2013 (e.g. Auto Associate Merge)
For information about this extension, go to the Visual Studio Gallery for it:
http://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/b54d49ea-ce4a-4fd6-8ba9-35f464f15575

I'm looking for ideas to add to the Team Explorer Extensions and others to contribute to turn this into a suite of extensions for Team Explorer 2012 and 2013.

Some enhancements coming to the Auto Associate Merge Extension:
  1. Discard changeset on merge
  2. Settings page for allowing policy overrides and workspace location to use (SCE or Pending Changes)
  3. Link to changeset details
  4. Merge from a specific folder instead of root only
  5. Check permissions before attempting merge
